name: Tree Skinner
description: The Tree Skinner appears as a normal tree when motionless, using its bark-like skin to blend into wooded areas, making it a formidable foe that utilizes its environment.
memorable: Its ability to camouflage as a tree and to grapple with vine-like attacks makes it a unique threat in forested settings, plus it has a tree as a vessel.
goals: To protect its territory by ambushing those who venture too close and utilizing its tree camouflage.
relations: It may be encountered with other fiends or creatures that inhabit forests.
environment: Typically found in wooded areas where it can hide among trees.
strengths: High Dexterity and Charisma scores make it agile and compelling in interactions; it can effectively conceal itself.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire damage and is limited to inhabiting a single tree for only three days.
attacks: Claw attack inflicts slashing and poison damage, while Vine Whip can grapple multiple targets.
most_powerful_ability: Inhabit Tree grants increased AC and tremorsense while vulnerable to fire damage, allowing it to hide effectively.
senses: The Tree Skinner has tremorsense with a radius of 30 feet when inside a tree, allowing it to detect movement in the ground nearby.
skills: It has high proficiency in Stealth, allowing it to move undetected in wooded areas.
additional_information: Has a False Appearance ability enabling it to camouflage as a tree.
Magic Resistance grants advantage on saving throws against spells.
Can grapple up to two creatures simultaneously with its Vine Whip attack.
Charmed immunity enhances its survivability in combat situations.
Can cause a tree to die and re-emerge when reduced to 15 hit points.
test_queries: fiend that disguises as a tree
deceptive creature that ambushes in forests
chaotic evil fiend using vine attacks
